:::Vulois:::

::he shakes his head::
Vulois: No. The Chivtrons should stay, and try to bring whatever peace is 
possible to this planet.  I think what we have is good.  Now come in, and 
we'll leave.

--part1_68.ec7a0ae.282e03f4_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>:::Vulois:::
<BR>
<BR>::he shakes his head::
<BR>Vulois: No. The Chivtrons should stay, and try to bring whatever peace is 
<BR>possible to this planet.  I think what we have is good.  Now come in, and 
<BR>we'll leave.</FONT></HTML>
